sentences.sContent: A baby monkey clasps its mother’s fur tightly.
sentences.sCn: 小猴子紧紧地抓住母猴的毛。

sentences.sContent: She stood with her hands clasped tightly together .
sentences.sCn: 她站着，双手紧紧地握在一起。

remMethod.val: 毕业时， 同班(class)同学紧抱(clasp)在一起

trans.tranCn: 扣住， 钩住；紧握， 紧抱
trans.tranOther: to hold someone or something tightly, closing your fingers or arms around them

trans.tranCn: 握手； 拥抱；扣子， 钩子
trans.tranOther: a small metal object for fastening a bag, belt, piece of jewellery etc
